function.name: google_maps
function.description: Complete Google Maps API access. Geocoding, directions, places search, distance matrix, timezone, elevation. Free tier: $200 credit/month. Uses GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY or GOOGLE_API_KEY (fallback).

address.description: Address string for geocode operation (e.g., '1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA')

origin.description: Origin address/coordinates for directions/distance_matrix (e.g., 'Paris, France' or '48.8566,2.3522')

origins.description: Array of origin addresses/coordinates for distance_matrix (max 25)

destinations.description: Array of destination addresses/coordinates for distance_matrix (max 25)

mode.description: Travel mode for directions. Default: driving

query.description: Search query for places_search (e.g., 'restaurants near Eiffel Tower')

type.description: Place type for places_nearby (e.g., 'restaurant', 'hotel', 'cafe', 'bar', 'museum'). See Google Places types.

radius.description: Search radius in meters for places_nearby. Default: 1000, max: 50000

alternatives.description: Return alternative routes for directions. Default: false

avoid.description: Route features to avoid for directions

departure_time.description: Departure time for directions (ISO 8601 or 'now'). For transit/traffic predictions.

arrival_time.description: Arrival time for directions (ISO 8601). For transit mode only.

limit.description: Max results for search operations. Default: 20, max: 60
